pages.text: $(li)The Magnet is a block that can attrack metal blocks when is receiving a redstone singnal.$(br)$(li)It has two sides, the blue side will attrack metalic blocks up to 4 blocks away.

$(li)The red side will repel metalic blocks up to 4 blocks away.$(br)$(li)Some of the blocks that are affected by Magnets are the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/iron_block)Iron Blocks$(/l), the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/gold_block)Gold Blocks$(/l), or the $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/chains)Chains$(/l).
